title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 390: Featuring Colby Armstrong
description:
On Episode 390 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Colby Armstrong. Army makes his return for the full episode to talk all things NHL Playoffs and break down each series. The boys also discuss his NHL career, his broadcasting career, and some Sidney Crosby stories.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
